main event: An unidentified object was observed in Ruston, Louisiana on the evening of April 22, 1969.
interesting points: The object was seen approximately 7:15 PM after sunset,The observer used 7-power binoculars to try and discern details,The object was described as very bright and emitting a bluish-yellow glow,The report includes a hand-drawn sketch with 'Four darker areas' and 'Triangles',The sighting lasted for approximately 11 to 17 minutes.
sighted object: an unidentified bright object emitting a bluish-yellow glow
witness description: The observer is an employee at the Air Force Missile Site and has extensive experience with telescopes.
